name: Scan Result Tenable
author: Andrey Glauzer
description: Get Tenable scan result by hostname or IPV4

configurationItems.name: host
configurationItems.description: The address of the Tenable.sc instance to connect to.

configurationItems.name: access_key
configurationItems.description: The API access key to use for sessionless authentication

configurationItems.name: secret_key
configurationItems.description: The API secret key to use for sessionless authentication

configurationItems.name: password
configurationItems.description: The password to use for session authentication

configurationItems.name: username
configurationItems.description: The username to use for session authentication
